training_program.name: Weightlifting Strength Program
training_program.description: This program focuses on strength development for weightlifters.

training_sets.name: Back Squats
training_sets.description: Perform back squats to build lower body strength.

training_sets.name: Deadlifts
training_sets.description: Execute deadlifts to develop overall strength.

training_sets.name: Bench Press
training_sets.description: Perform bench press to strengthen the chest, shoulders, and arms.

training_set.name: Warm-up Routine
training_set.description: Start with a comprehensive warm-up routine to prepare the body for lifting.
